oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NON-UNIFORMITY IN THE WIND GENERATED GRAVITY WAVES PHASE DISTRIBUTION
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rodriguez, German
Soares, C. Guedas
Martell, E. Perez
Nieto, J.C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: gravity waves
phase distribution
nonuniformity in waves
wind waves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Empirical results which show the existence of a relationship among the probabilistic behaviour of the sea surface elevation, the statistical properties of the phase spectral estimates and the sea surface bispectra are presented. Furthermore, some theoretical relations proposed to characterise the marginal density function of the waves phase for the linear and non-linear wave records are examined.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 26 (1998): Proceedings of 26th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1998.
